name: Anger Birb: World
description:
Anger Birb was happily living in their home in San Francisco when some bad pigs took their eggs! This time the pigs have fled overseas, all the way to Sydney. Anger Birb swore that they would seek revenge on the bad pigs.

Click to drag and fire Anger Birb and hit those pigs for victory!

(I made this game mostly on a flight from from SFO to SYD)
